about_the_game:
Play with 4-16 players online in this co-op action game as you try to survive a viral outbreak! A pandemic has hit the world hard and Humans are stuck in lockdown. Viruses chase down the Humans who are running against time, and Humans are desperate for lockdown supplies (like toilet paper)!

Will you avoid the Viruses and help to save humanity? Or will you get infected and become a Virus yourself? Find out in this quirky, intense game of tag, where you can play with your friends and survive the pandemic together!

Ready to save the world? Then enter at your own risk...it's addictively sick!



  • Win by avoiding infection until the timer runs out.
  • React quickly to dodge Viruses and collect vaccines!]
  • Use vaccines to cure yourself or teammates in the sick state.
  • Collect toilet paper and coins while you avoid the Virus.
  • Strategically use vaccines and work together to maximise your chance of survival.



  • One or more random players start as Viruses.
  • Chase and infect Human players by bumping into them.
  • Coordinate with other infected players to corner Humans.
  • Prevent Humans from curing each other to increase your numbers!
  • Win by infecting everyone.



  • Infected Humans enter a 15-second sick state with slowed movement.
  • Sick players must find a vaccine or be cured by a teammate before time runs out.
  • If not cured within 15 seconds, sick players turn into Viruses!

Features
  • Customisation: Choose your character's appearance with various Human and Virus skins (more coming soon!.
  • Purchase skins and customization items with coins.
  • Unlock special skins and items with toilet paper!
  • Quick-join option to find online games fast.
  • Cross-platform play between PC, Android, and iOS!
  • Cool and crazy maps (more coming soon!)
